// Texture Reference
// Written By 00Schmidt with help from Aaron0000
// interfacer used in this example
// I recomend going and inspecting the gun while BL2 is in windowed mode so that you can see your changes on the fly
// In case something is unclear set a parameters "G" value to 1.000000 and you'll see what I'm talking about
// 1.000000 is the max value for a color
// highlight A is splatter
// midtone A is splatter under highlight A
// shadow A is main color
// Highlight C is small detail near and on foregrip
// Midtone C under highlight C
// Shadow C Top Detail on high side of vertical grip and trigger, as well as inner gear
// Highlight B Distressing around circles that look like holes as well as the top of the stock
// Midtone B On top of highlight B
// Shadow B On top of Midtone B, Main color
// Shadow C #2 does nothing on interfacer

//EXAMPLE: INTERFACER
		set Sage_GunMaterials.Materials.Shotgun.Mati_HyperionRaid_SG_Interfacer VectorParameterValues ((ParameterName="p_AColorHilight",ParameterValue=(R=0.000000,G=0.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=170714760,B=1132476783,C=-275668290,D=655702143)),(ParameterName="p_AColorMidtone",ParameterValue=(R=0.000000,G=0.000000,B=0.500000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=473594356,B=1338758895,C=824823946,D=864253813)),(ParameterName="p_AColorShadow",ParameterValue=(R=0.000000,G=0.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=-429590341,B=1156435294,C=-1015192901,D=687313413)),(ParameterName="p_CColorHilight",ParameterValue=(R=0.000000,G=0.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=170714760,B=1132476783,C=-275668290,D=655702143)),(ParameterName="p_CColorMidtone",ParameterValue=(R=0.000000,G=0.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=473594356,B=1338758895,C=824823946,D=864253813)),(ParameterName="p_CColorShadow",ParameterValue=(R=0.000000,G=0.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=-429590341,B=1156435294,C=-1015192901,D=687313413)),(ParameterName="p_BColorHilight",ParameterValue=(R=0.000000,G=0.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=170714760,B=1132476783,C=-275668290,D=655702143)),(ParameterName="p_BColorMidtone",ParameterValue=(R=0.000000,G=0.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=473594356,B=1338758895,C=824823946,D=864253813)),(ParameterName="p_BColorShadow",ParameterValue=(R=0.000000,G=0.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=-429590341,B=1156435294,C=-1015192901,D=687313413),(ParameterName="p_CColorShadow",ParameterValue=(R=0.000000,G=1.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=-429590341,B=1156435294,C=-1015192901,D=687313413)))

//A113 (Stomper Replacement)
		set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Barrel.AR_Barrel_Jakobs_Stomper CustomFiringModeDefinition'GD_Weap_SniperRifles.FiringModes.Bullet_RailGun'

		set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Barrel.AR_Barrel_Jakobs_Stomper WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponClipSize',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.500000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponExtraShotChance',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.50000)),(Attribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponShotCost',PriorityIncrease=0.500000),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponSpread',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.800000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

		set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Barrel.AR_Barrel_Jakobs_Stomper GestaltModeSkeletalMeshName AR_Barrel_Alien

		set Common_GunMaterials.Materials.AssaultRifle.Mati_JakobsUnique_Stomper ParentCommon_GunMaterials.Materials.SMG.Mati_Tediore_Legendary_Babymaker
		
//Gatling Hammer Buster (Hammer Buster Barrel Replacement)
		set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Barrel.AR_Barrel_Dahl_HammerBuster GestaltModeSkeletalMeshName AR_Barrel_Vladof

		set GD_Weap_AssaultRifle.Barrel.AR_Barrel_Dahl_HammerBuster WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectilesPerShot',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=2.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponShotCost',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.500000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponSpread',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=2.000000)),,(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponBarrelSpinDownDuration',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=0.000000,BaseValueAttribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.WeaponManufacturer.Weapon_Is_Jakobs',InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=8.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=0.500000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponFireInterval',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=-0.7500000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=10.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponAutomaticBurstCount',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.700000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponBurstInterval',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=-0.500000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponSpread',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.500000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponDamage',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.350000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)))

//HAL (Shotgun1340 Lazer Shotgun)
		set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Barrel.SG_Barrel_Tediore_Shotgun1340 CustomFiringModeDefinition FiringModeDefinition'GD_Weap_SniperRifles.FiringModes.Bullet_RailGun'

		set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Barrel.SG_Barrel_Tediore_Shotgun1340 rarity (BaseValueConstant=168.000000)

		set Common_GunMaterials.Materials.Shotgun.Mati_HyperionRare_SG Parent Common_GunMaterials.Materials.Shotgun.Mati_HyperionLegendary_SG_ConferenceCall

		set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Name.Title.Title__Unique_Shotgun1340 PartName HAL 9001

		set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Name.Title.Title__Unique_Shotgun1340:AttributePresentationDefinition_8 NoConstraintText I'm Sorry Krieg, I can't let you do that

		set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Barrel.SG_Barrel_Tediore_Shotgun1340 GestaltModeSkeletalMeshName SG_Barrel_Hyperion

		set GD_Weap_Shotgun.Barrel.SG_Barrel_Tediore_Shotgun1340 WeaponAttributeEffects ((AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponProjectilesPerShot',ModifierType=MT_PreAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=3.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.000000)),(AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.Weapon.WeaponClipSize',ModifierType=MT_Scale,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.700000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=2.000000)

		set Common_GunMaterials.Materials.Shotgun.Mati_HyperionLegendary_SG_ConferenceCall VectorParameterValues ((ParameterName="p_AColorHilight",ParameterValue=(R=0.800000,G=0.800000,B=0.800000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=170714760,B=1132476783,C=-275668290,D=655702143)),(ParameterName="p_AColorMidtone",ParameterValue=(R=1.000000,G=1.000000,B=1.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=473594356,B=1338758895,C=824823946,D=864253813)),(ParameterName="p_AColorShadow",ParameterValue=(R=0.600000,G=0.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=-429590341,B=1156435294,C=-1015192901,D=687313413)),(ParameterName="p_CColorHilight",ParameterValue=(R=0.355000,G=0.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=170714760,B=1132476783,C=-275668290,D=655702143)),(ParameterName="p_CColorMidtone",ParameterValue=(R=0.455000,G=0.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=473594356,B=1338758895,C=824823946,D=864253813)),(ParameterName="p_CColorShadow",ParameterValue=(R=0.555000,G=0.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=-429590341,B=1156435294,C=-1015192901,D=687313413)),(ParameterName="p_BColorHilight",ParameterValue=(R=0.800000,G=0.800000,B=0.800000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=170714760,B=1132476783,C=-275668290,D=655702143)),(ParameterName="p_BColorMidtone",ParameterValue=(R=0.900000,G=0.900000,B=0.900000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=473594356,B=1338758895,C=824823946,D=864253813)),(ParameterName="p_BColorShadow",ParameterValue=(R=1.000000,G=1.000000,B=1.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=-429590341,B=1156435294,C=-1015192901,D=687313413),(ParameterName="p_CColorShadow",ParameterValue=(R=0.000000,G=1.000000,B=0.000000,A=1.000000),ExpressionGUID=(A=-429590341,B=1156435294,C=-1015192901,D=687313413)))

//Ammo Regen Opportunity (Opportunity Relic Replacement)
		set GD_Artifacts.A_Item_Unique.Artifact_Opportunity AttributeSlotEffects ((SlotName="Effect1",bExternalSlot=True,bRunEffectsAsSkill=False,AttributeToModify=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.PlayerCurrentWeaponAmmoRegenerationMultiplier',ConstraintAttribute=None,ModifierType=MT_PostAdd,BaseModifierValue=(BaseValueConstant=1.000000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=AttributeInitializationDefinition'GD_Artifacts.BalanceAttributes.Init_ModifierBase_Linear',BaseValueScaleConstant=0.040000),PerGradeUpgrade=(BaseValueConstant=0.020000,BaseValueAttribute=None,InitializationDefinition=None,BaseValueScaleConstant=1.0000000),bIncludeInFunStats=False,bIncludeAlliesAsTarget=False,bEnforceMinimumGrade=False,bEnforceMaximumGrade=False,MinimumGrade=0,MaximumGrade=12,TargetInstanceDataName=)))

		set GD_Artifacts.A_Item_Unique.Artifact_Opportunity UIStatList ((bDisplayAsModifierOnly=True,AttributeStyle=ATTRSTYLE_ModifierText,SupplementalAttributeStyle=ATTRSTYLE_JustNumber,StatCombinationMethod=SCM_Multiply,Attribute=AttributeDefinition'D_Attributes.GameplayAttributes.PlayerCurrentWeaponAmmoRegenerationMultiplier',ConstraintAttribute=None,SupplementalAttributeExpression=(AttributeOperand1=None,ComparisonOperator=OPERATOR_EqualTo,Operand2Usage=OPERAND_PreferAttribute,AttributeOperand2=None,ConstantOperand2=0.000000),SupplementalAttributeToAppend=None))

		set GD_Artifacts.Body.Body_Opportunity:AttributePresentationDefinition_0 Description Increases [skill]ammo regeneration[-skill].

//Bastard (Boom Puppy Replacement)
		set GD_Iris_Weapons.AssaultRifles.AR_Barrel_Torgue_BoomPuppy  CustomFiringModeDefinition FiringModeDefinition 'GD_Iris_Weapons.FiringModes.Bullet_Sniper_Cobra'

		set GD_Iris_Weapons.Name.Title.Title_Unique_BoomPuppy PartName Bastard

		set GD_Iris_Weapons.Name.Title.Title_Unique_BoomPuppy:AttributePresentationDefinition_8 NoConstraintText Daddy was a firecracker

		set GD_Iris_Weapons.AssaultRifles.AR_Barrel_Torgue_BoomPuppy GestaltModeSkeletalMeshName AR_Barrel_Vladof_Alt
